# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a unique blend of features that make it stand out in its category. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you for $100. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences. I'm confident it will add significant value to your collection or usage. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
